111.content:
You start to feel a bit dizzy.
You collapse to the floor and start to shrink.
"what's happening to me?!" you shriek as you slowly shrink down in size.
Eventually you stop shrinking and find yourself under a bundle of clothes.
You find out that they were the clothes you were wearing before you shrunk.
Then thankfully you see you were still wearing your knickers so you weren't completly naked.
What do you do now?
111.title: You shrink

1112.content:
This wasn't the situation you would normally find yourself in, so naturally you were kind of unsure what to do.
You figure it's best if you stay put. Danny will be back, and he will see the bundle of clothes and see what's wrong.

You take a moment to look around your room. Everything looked so big. It was absolutely incredible.
It was like a brand new world. You stare at you surroundings. It was very cool and awesome but you were still unsure on what to do.


The door opens and Danny enters, his towering body makes you realize that your are quite tiny.
And he is quite huge.

You stare up at him in awe and fear. You continue to stare at him, and then you notice he is looking straight at you.
He bends down to reduce the distance between him and you.

"surprise" he says with a smile. "I thought you wanted a little adventure tonight. Don't worry buddy, I ain't gonna hurt you at all. I'm going to take good care of you. But now, we can have lots more fun. You can do a lot of fun and cool things at your size. Now, what do want you do first Miley?"
1112.title: Enter the huge danny

11121.content:
Danny smiled.
"Okay. You go hide, I'll count." he said.
You nod.
Danny walked out of the room and covered his eyes. He started counting.
Where do you hide?
11121.title: Play hide and seek

111212.content:
You giggle and run under your desk.
You stay in the darkness.
"30! Ready or not, here I come!" You hear Danny shout.
You go very quiet.

He picks you up and buts you on your bed post.

"GEE WHIZ!" you say. "Everything is so big!"
You jump on your desk. Everything was so big.
"Do you want to do downstairs Miley?" Danny asks.
You reply......

choices: Kevin comes home early from school
Zack and Kevin have a barefoot wrestling match
Zack put his shoes and socks back on.
123.content:
you walk back into the living room and notice Zack asleep on your dad's recliner with his sneakers on the foot rest. You sneak up on him and carefully pull off both of his shoes. Zack is wearing some black ankle socks over his size 11 feet. You notice the nice shape of his feet through his socks and carefully peel them off his feet revealing two semi tan, hairless bare feet with pedicured toes. Zack's toes are slender, but his big toes are longer than normal. As you admire his bare beauties, he splays his bare toes.
You decide to tickle his bare feet since they look like your brother Kevin's bare feet. As you lightly use your fingers to brush against Zack's pinkish soles and toes, you think back on how much you love to tickle your two brother's bare feet. Your twin Jack's bare feet are okay, but your brother Kevin's bare feet are very similar. Every time you had the chance, you would tackle Kevin when he got home on break from school. You would take off his shoes and peel off his socks in a matter of seconds and tickle his bare feet to no end.
You recollect one time that you even kissed and sucked on his big toes because he dared you.
Zack's big toes seem to be calling out to you and suddenly find themselves inside your mouth. You swirl your tongue around both of them.
Zack moans a little causing you to stop suddenly. You dry his toes off with his socks and put the socks back on his feet.

Later, as you both watch TV, he begins to tease you about being a tom boy. You challenge him to a wrestling match on the carpeted floor. After a couple rounds, you notice one of Zack's socks is off his bare foot and the other is half way off. Those golden bare toes look breathtaking against the light colored carpet. The next move you make is to pull off his other sock leaving him completely barefoot. As he pins you down and tickles your ribs and arms, you have the chance to tickle his bare soles and toes.
Zack begins to laugh telling you that his feet are very ticklish. His toes splay as you tickle them more.
123.title: other choices

choices: Zack puts on his shirt and shorts but stays barefoot
Kevin picks you up and places you on his shoulder
1231.content:
As you continue to tickle Zack's bare feet and toes, your older brother pays you a surprise visit. You almost immediately stop the foot torture and run and give your brother a hug. Zack lays on the carpet recovering from his bare feet being tickled. Kevin notices Zack is barefoot and asks you about it. You tell Kevin that Zack challenged you in a wrestling match and his socks just happened to come off his feet. Kevin puts his sports bag down and helps Zack up and introduces himself. They are both about the same height, build and weight. You ask to see them both wrestle each other.
Kevin tells Zack he is game and pulls off his polo shirt revealing a golden tan, hairless chest. Zack does the same, but his chest is not as tan as Kevin's chest. Zack asks Kevin to take his sneakers off so he won't injure his bare feet. Kevin stoops down and unties his sneakers and pulls them and his socks off revealing similar looking bare feet to that of Zack. Kevin even pulls his pants off leaving him just in his boxers. Zack pulls off his shorts leaving him only in boxers. The two square off and circle around. You are fascinated at seeing your older brother's feet and Zack's bare feet at the same time. As they wrestle, you try and intervene tickling both of their bare feet.
Just then, you feel yourself becoming smaller and smaller. Those two pairs of bare beauties are becoming bigger and bigger. As the boys rest between matches, they notice you have shrunk to 6 inches and are trying to still tickle their bare soles. Zack lets you climb onto his right big toe as Kevin's bare feet are almost opposite. Kevin's bare feet are about an inch longer, but he has normal size slender toes. Kevin picks you up by the waist and places you in between his big toe and second toe. You tease and tickle his big toe as he begins to laugh and splay his toes. You fall onto the carpet and shrink to about 2 inches.
Zack and Kevin walk to the kitchen to grab a snack as you try and follow them.
1231.title: Kevin comes home early from school

info.brief_description: your parents go out for 4 days, they hire a babysitter then you shrink what happens next?
info.description:
Your name is Miley. You are 10 years old and you have a brother called Kevin who is 17 another brother called Jack who is your twin brother (same age as you) and a sister called violet who is 18
Kevin is a university studying medical stuff and is away from home alot for long periods of time.
Jack is on a school trip to iceland to study volcanoes and to see exicnt ones.
Violet has just taken her GCSE's and got 9 A*s and 2 B's. she is a very clever girl.

your parents had to go on a buisness trip and they arranged a babysitter for you.

Nothing innapropiate.
you can have vore in it only if your small.
